properties.description: Tomcat cluster with Session Replication

properties.label: Name
properties.description: The name of the Tomcat cluster service

properties.label: Description
properties.description: The description of the Tomcat cluster service

properties.label: vxnet
properties.description: Choose a vxnet to join

properties.label: Tomcat Nodes
properties.description: Tomcat node properties

properties.label: loadbalancer
properties.description: Choose a loadbalancer service (When you create loadbalancer, you need to select the Internet type. Loadbalancer listener need to enable Session Sticky. Listener protocol should be http)

properties.label: CPU
properties.description: CPUs of each node

properties.label: Memory
properties.description: memory of each node (in MiB)

properties.label: Instance Class
properties.description: The instance type for the cluster to run, such as high performance, high performance plus

properties.label: Node Count
properties.description: Number of nodes for the cluster to create

properties.label: Volume Size
properties.description: The volume size for each node
Tomcat cluster service properties

properties.label: User name to manage Tomcat
properties.description: User name to manage Tomcat

properties.label: Password of Tomcat user
properties.description: Password of Tomcat user, the default password is 'qing0pwd'

properties.label: Tomcat character encoding
properties.description: Tomcat character encoding, this value will be set in javax.servlet.request.encoding and file.encoding when launching Tomcat, also set in URIEncoding in server.xml

properties.label: The max number of active threads
properties.description: The max number of active threads in Tomcat shared thread pool

properties.label: The minimum number of kept alive threads
properties.description: The minimum number of threads always kept alive in Tomcat shared thread pool

properties.label: The number of milliseconds before an idle thread shutsdown
properties.description: The number of milliseconds before an idle thread shutsdown, unless the number of active threads are less or equal to minSpareThreads

properties.label: Java runtime properties
properties.description: Java runtime properties when running Tomcat, leave empty if you accept our default JVM heap size setting(1/4 memory as xms, and 1/2 memory as xmx). Note: our default setting will not take effect if you input any value in this area, the validaton of JAVA_OPTS should be handled by you ahead of time, otherwise Tomcat server may fail to start

properties.label: How to get WAR file
properties.description: Choose a way to upload WAR to Tomcat server, the default way is using Tomcat manager UI or command, the other option is QingStor. Note: Tomcat manager could only deploy WAR to single node, we monitor that deployment and copy the deployed WAR file to watched folder of Tomcat FarmWarDeployer, which will distribute this file to other nodes

properties.label: Redis Database
properties.description: Whether to use Redis database to replicate session data

properties.label: The IP address of Redis database
properties.description: The IP address of Redis database, leave empty if you choose not to use Redis database

properties.label: The port of Redis database
properties.description: The port of Redis database, leave empty if you choose not to use Redis database

properties.label: Redis database number
properties.description: Redis Database Number, leave empty if you choose not to use Redis database

properties.label: access_key_id
properties.description: access_key_id to access QingStor service for web application(WAR) deployment, leave empty if you chooose to use Tomcat Manager or Jenkins

properties.label: secret_access_key
properties.description: secret_access_key to access QingStor service for web application(WAR) deployment, leave empty if you chooose to use Tomcat Manager or Jenkins

properties.label: zone
properties.description: Zone of bucket for web application(WAR) deployment, leave empty if you chooose to use Tomcat Manager or Jenkins

properties.label: bucket
properties.description: Bucket name for web application(WAR) deployment, leave empty if you chooose to use Tomcat Manager or Jenkins

properties.label: war name
properties.description: The web application(WAR) file Name, leave empty if you chooose to use Tomcat Manager or Jenkins

properties.label: MySql Database
properties.description: Whether to use MySql database for development

properties.label: User name of MySql database
properties.description: User name of MySql database, leave empty if you choose not to use MySql database

properties.label: Password of MySql database
properties.description: Password of MySql database, leave empty if you choose not to use MySql database

properties.label: The IP address of MySql database
properties.description: The IP address of MySql database, leave empty if you choose not to use MySql database

properties.label: The port of MySql database
properties.description: The port of MySql database, leave empty if you choose not to use MySql database

properties.label: MySql database name
properties.description: MySql Database Name, leave empty if you choose not to use MySql database

properties.label: Datasoure name of Tomcat JDBC connection pool
properties.description: Datasoure name of Tomcat JDBC connection pool to connect MySql database

properties.label: The maximum number of active database connections
properties.description: The maximum number of active database connections that can be allocated from this pool at the same time

properties.label: The maximum number of kept database connections
properties.description: The maximum number of database connections that should be kept in the pool at all times

properties.label: The maximum number of milliseconds before a database connection timeout
properties.description: The maximum number of milliseconds that the pool will wait (when there are no available connections) for a database connection to be returned before throwing an exception
